title: godoc   panics first few runs;  then ok (tracebacks attached)
body:
by **yarkot1**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  pull go from repository; install
2.  run godoc --http=:6060
3.  repeat;

What is the expected output?

Docs serverd locally;


What do you see instead?

two panics, then docs served.


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

none set; 
uname -a:
Darwin my-MacBook-Pro.local 10.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 10.4.0: Fri Apr 23 18:28:53 PDT
2010; root:xnu-1504.7.4~1/RELEASE_I386 i386


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

5992bf56aa72 tip


Please provide any additional information below.

after pull and ./all.bash install, cd $GOROOT  and run:
$ godoc --http=:6060

Output file (terminal log) attached, with panics, etc.
Attachments: 1. godoc.panic.log (19733 bytes)
